head.title: WWMM Plugin
head.summary: Information about the World Wide Molecular Matrix plugin.

section.title: World Wide Molecular Matrix(WWMM) Plugin
section.para: Plugins that allows you to interact from within your CDK application with the World Wide Molecule Matrix, or by a similarly typed local XIndice database.
The source code can be found in the cdk-plugins module in CDK cvs.
